content: this cowl was created for a simple project that is just about enjoying the yarn and doing some relaxed knitting like the name suggests it can be made on autopilot so a great project for knitting on the bus train or at a knit night instructions are given for 1 size with the necessary info for customising width and circumference provided it is designed for worsted weight 10ply yarn but can be done using any yarn you like sample colour 416 indiecita **bind off** use a stretchy bind off cast off loosely or use any method that works for you find link to video from very pink knits for simple stretchy bind off here 1 or google one that works for you 1 https //verypink com/2015/03/04/simple-stretchy-bind-off/
